Title: SQL Query
URI: SELECT REQUEST_ID, REQUEST_UUID, DELETED_FLAG, BUKRS, NOTE, NOTE_BY_PROCESSOR, REQUEST_STATUS, REQUEST_STEP, CONTRACT_TYPE, ACCOUNT_ACTION, MANDT, BANKS, CAST(HASH_SHA256(TO_BINARY(CONCAT(CREATED_BY,(SELECT current_connection||current_user_id() FROM DUMMY)))) as NVARCHAR(5000)) "CREATED_BY", CAST(HASH_SHA256(TO_BINARY(CONCAT(LASTCHGED_BY,(SELECT current_connection||current_user_id() FROM DUMMY)))) as NVARCHAR(5000)) "LASTCHGED_BY", CAST(HASH_SHA256(TO_BINARY(CONCAT(PROCESSED_BY,(SELECT current_connection||current_user_id() FROM DUMMY)))) as NVARCHAR(5000)) "PROCESSED_BY", WAERS, CREATED_AT, LOCAL_LAST_CHANGED_AT, LASTCHGED_AT, PROCESSED_AT, TITLE from FCLM_BAM_BAOR
